types.header_description: The CSS properties that allow you to animate almost any other property

properties.name: animation-delay
properties.description: Defines how long the animation has to wait before starting. The animation will only be delayed on its first iteration.

usecases.usecase_description: The animation will wait zero seconds, and thus start right away.
You can use decimal values in seconds with the keyword s
You can use milliseconds instead of seconds, with the keyword ms
You can use negative values: the animation will start as if it had already been playing for 500ms

properties.name: prop1
properties.description: Defines how long the animation has to wait before starting. The animation will only be delayed on its first iteration.

usecases.usecase_description: The animation will wait zero seconds, and thus start right away.
You can use decimal values in seconds with the keyword s
